Text: Fearless warrior. Weapon expert. High strength, dexterity.
Low-ranking knight. High HP, solid armor. Not easily toppled.
Aimless wanderer. Wields scimitar. High dexterity.
Guilt-ridden thief. High critical hits. Has Master Key.
Savage bandit. High strength. Wields heavy battle axe.
Bow-wielding hunter. OK at close-range but weak with magic.
Sorcerer of Vinheim Dragon School. Casts soul sorceries.
Swamp pyromancer. Casts fire spells and wields a hand axe.
Cleric on Pilgrimage Wields a mace and casts healing miracles.
Unclothed enigma. Only armed with club and old plank shield.
Divine holy water. Fully restores HP and status.
Explodes upon impact when thrown. More deadly than std bomb.
Tiny sprite called humanity. Sometimes found on carcasses.
Binoculars. Use to peer at faraway sights.
Trinket. No effect, but fond memories comfort travelers.
Opens any basic lock. Initial equip for thief.
Special tribal ring. Grants small increase to HP.
Gift from a witch. Ancient ring with no obvious effect.
